name: CBBN
description: CBBN Token was created to serve the ecosystem of CBBN Project, with products such as CBBN News, CBBN Swap, CBBN NFT and Token Ranking. We want to bring a daily use of crypto and mass adoption to the people globally through our ecosystem services/products. We have allocated funds from every transaction to develop our ecosystem through the developer community. CBBN News is a website specializing in providing information about cryptocurrencies, securities and real estate. With the purpose of building a comprehensive ecosystem to help investors have full information as well as tools when participating in cryptocurrency investment.
